statements: UPDATE user_behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'click', data = 'data1' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET data = 'data2', behavior_type = 'scroll' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET behavior_type='clicked' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET data='{"action":"viewed","detail":"profile"}' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activities SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, activity_type = 'Workout' WHERE activity_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, username = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_type = 'Sports', timestamp = '2022-05-15 10:30:00' WHERE activity_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET age = 25 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = '{"theme": "dark"}' WHERE user_id = 2 AND preference_name = 'theme';
UPDATE users SET age = 30, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = '{"theme": "dark", "language": "en"}' WHERE user_id = 2 AND preference_name = 'settings';
UPDATE UserBehaviorData SET event_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE AIModelStats SET accuracy = 87.5 WHERE model_id = 56789;
UPDATE UserBehaviorData SET event_type = 'click', data = '{"action":"clicked"}' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE AIModelStats SET performance_metrics = '{"loss":"0.15","precision":"0.85"}', accuracy = 90.75 WHERE model_id = 567890;
UPDATE users SET age = 25, location = 'New York' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE products SET price = 49.99, description = 'New and improved version' WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE username = 'JohnSmith';
UPDATE sessions SET interaction_count = interaction_count + 1 WHERE user_id = 101 AND session_id = 500
